mapper.sql: serialNumber, department, repairStaff, content, cellPhone, assetNumber, assetSn, orderPeople, assistants, type, status, registerPeople, registerDate, modifyPeople, modifyDate, image
mapper.select: select a.depPhone,b.name,b.id,b.number from t_department_info a,t_member_info b where a.id = b.depId and a.id = #{id}
select a.depPhone,a.depName,a.id from t_department_info a,t_member_info b where a.id = b.depId and b.number = #{id}
select a.id,a.name,a.number from t_member_info a where a.depId = (select b.department FROM t_repair_register b where b.id =#{id} )
select b.id,b.type from t_repair_type b where b.disable=0;
select c.id,c.status from t_repair_status c where c.disable=0;
select * from t_member_info t where t.flag=1;
mapper.update:
update set
department = #{department},
repairStaff = #{repairStaff},
cellPhone = #{cellPhone},
assetNumber = #{assetNumber},
assetSn = #{assetSn},
content = #{content},
orderPeople = #{orderPeople},
assistants = #{assistants},
type = #{type},
status = #{status},
modifyPeople = #{modifyPeople},
modifyDate = #{modifyDate},
image = #{image},
id = #{id} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from (SELECT a.id,a.image,a.serialNumber,a.department,a.repairStaff,a.content, a.cellPhone,a.assetNumber,a.assetSn,a.orderPeople,a.assistants, a.type as typeId,a.status as statusId,a.registerPeople,a.registerDate, a.modifyPeople,a.modifyDate,b.type,c.status,d.depName,d.depPhone, e.name as jiedan,f.name as baoxiu FROM t_repair_register a join t_repair_type b on a.type = b.id join t_repair_status c on a.status = c.id join t_department_info d on a.department = d.id left join t_member_info e on a.orderPeople = e.number left join t_member_info f on a.repairStaff = f.number) as t where t.id = #{id}
